DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish feasiblity recruit obese breast cancer survivor end treatment , get survivor lose weight attend follow-up visit 6 month .
DOC.detailed_description: Breast cancer relate lymphedema occurs 20-30 % survivor . Weight loss could prevent onset . We seek pilot study establish feasibility 1 ) recruiting survivor risk lymphedema weight loss intervention , 2 ) achieve 10-15 % weight loss 26 week population , 3 ) attendance follow-up visit 6 month .
